name: v1.4-beta7: directinput freezes, general reliability
body:
Start by downloading [OpenKneeboard-v1.4-beta7.msi](https://github.com/OpenKneeboard/OpenKneeboard/releases/download/v1.4-beta7/OpenKneeboard-v1.4-beta7.msi); the documentation is [on OpenKneeboard.com](https://openkneeboard.com).


- fix DirectInput support after Windows reports a device was plugged/unplugged; this can happen when nothing's actually been connected or disconnected, and could lead to bindings not working until OpenKneeboard was restarted - [commit](https://github.com/OpenKneeboard/OpenKneeboard/commit/864ffb0a3381d83cfe465e05c28de298ecb39753)
- don't reload folder tabs (or tabs that include folders, like DCS Terrain tabs) when windows says the folder has changed, unless files that OpenKneeboard supports have actually been changed - [commit](https://github.com/OpenKneeboard/OpenKneeboard/commit/49d79956b80bb6b6d58a540f778b97a9dc48b252)
- internal threading model changes to systematically avoid some causes of crashes - [commit](https://github.com/OpenKneeboard/OpenKneeboard/commit/f29d127e18966f5ff524228e0f6ca8261b5cacdd)
- support ridiculously large repetitions for remote controls, e.g. 'toggle visibility/change tabs/change page 10,000 times' - [commit](https://github.com/OpenKneeboard/OpenKneeboard/commit/19f7e986ff5ab8a57213b1552ba4e2b95a7db892)
- use those to find and fix some extremely rare issues which generally require two things to happen within a few nanoseconds of each other, and are extremely unlikely to happen in normal usage:
  - fix crash or show/hide not working if showing/hiding the kneeboard at the same moment that a page is being updated - [commit](https://github.com/OpenKneeboard/OpenKneeboard/commit/3ac00dc7b2b6447f6fd8a4cc71c847747ee6c630)
  - fix crash if a file-backed page within any kind of tab is removed while the file is being written to - [commit](https://github.com/OpenKneeboard/OpenKneeboard/commit/83c6e1dc81a15fc5eade562d817cff6568f8f927)
  - fix crash if a tab is removed at the same moment that a page in it is pinned/bookmarked - [commit](https://github.com/OpenKneeboard/OpenKneeboard/commit/83c6e1dc81a15fc5eade562d817cff6568f8f927)
  - fix crash if the DCS mission is changed while anti-virus is still scanning the previous mission - [commit](https://github.com/OpenKneeboard/OpenKneeboard/commit/09738467362000b49fa7734d62da337ac9811d99)
  - fix excessive memory usage when a ridiculously large quantity of log messages are generated, for example, when toggling kneeboard visibility 1000 times per second -[commit](https://github.com/OpenKneeboard/OpenKneeboard/commit/311316b7c9cc6c10358172d433711af1280f40eb)
